articles.description: The law firm will also file to have Do Kwon’s property seized in the aftermath of last week’s Terra collapse.
articles.title: South Korean Law Firm to File Suit Against Terraform Labs CEO, Co-Founder

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: FreshCut CEO James Kuk joins the wave of former Twitch execs starting their own Web3 gaming companies.
articles.title: Polygon-Based Gaming Platform FreshCut Raises $15M

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The next iteration of Twitter could see the social media giant turn into a WeChat-style super app, according to Elon Musk.
articles.title: Elon Musk Wants Twitter to Be WeChat-Style Super App With Payments

articles.author: Ki Chong Tran,Stephen Graves,MoreReese
articles.description: ERC-721 is a token standard for non-fungible tokens on Ethereum. A pillar of the ecosystem, it supports billions of dollars worth of NFTs.
articles.title: What is ERC-721? The Ethereum NFT Token Standard

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Ben Bernanke pointed out the awkwardness of paying with Bitcoin right now and said the leading cryptocurrency has virtually no use.
articles.title: Bitcoin's Underlying Value 'Is to Do Ransomware': Former Fed Chair Bernanke

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: American billionaire Bill Ackman said that Terra’s collapse shared similarities with a pyramid scheme that had no underlying business.
articles.title: Billionaire Bill Ackman Calls Terra a ‘Crypto Version of a Pyramid Scheme’

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Several layer-1 crypto networks have taken a beating in the past 24 hours, with Kadena suffering double-digit losses.
articles.title: Kadena Posts Double-Digit Losses as More Layer-1 Cryptocurrencies Tank

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The major music label behind Taylor Swift, U2, Kendrick Lamar, and BTS will let artists drop NFTs on the new Web3 version of LimeWire.
articles.title: Universal Music Group to Release NFTs on LimeWire’s Algorand Marketplace

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Three top in-house attorneys have parted ways with the beleaguered crypto company.
articles.title: Terra’s Legal Team Resigns in Wake of UST, LUNA Collapse

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Vitalik Buterin is not quite sure how to feel about the state of Ethereum.
articles.title: Ethereum Creator Vitalik Buterin Opens Up About 'Contradictions' in His Web3 Values

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The stock photo powerhouse is breaking into the world of photography NFTs.
articles.title: Getty Images to Launch First NFTs On Palm Through Candy Digital

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: Robinhood is joining the ranks of MetaMask and Coinbase by launching a user-controlled crypto wallet that it plans to roll out by the end of the year.
articles.title: Robinhood Plans Ethereum Wallet With DeFi, NFT Trading—And No User Gas Fees

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Even after last year’s Bitcoin mining ban in China, the nation remains second only to the U.S. in terms of capacity.
articles.title: Covert Chinese Bitcoin Miners Still Account For 21% of Network Hashrate: Report

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: People Power lawmaker Yun Chang-Hyun alleges that various domestic exchanges saw the UST depeg as an opportunity for unscrupulous profiteering.
articles.title: South Korea Lawmaker Calls for Enquiry Into Exchanges' Terra Activities

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The DAO launched in partnership with LivePerson aims to be a decentralized customer service platform.
articles.title: ConsenSys, LivePerson Roll Out VillageDAO to Solve Crypto's Customer Service Problem

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: “Like Jason Voorhees, the myth of virtual currency’s anonymity refuses to die,” a federal judge wrote about using Bitcoin to dodge sanctions.
articles.title: Justice Department Charges Defendant With Sending $10M in Bitcoin to Sanctioned Country

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Amid Terra’s collapse last week, Tether also briefly lost its peg. Now, it appears some investors have dropped the stablecoin for the competition.
articles.title: Tether Supply Plummeted $7.4B Amid Depegging Concerns, Terra Collapse: Glassnode

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Galaxy Digital and Lemniscap led the round to help further Encode Club’s Web3 educational offerings.
articles.title: Encode Club Raises $5M for Web3 Developer Training

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: The blockchain-based film financing application will launch with a $50,000 documentary funding award from The Gotham Film & Media Institute.
articles.title: Coppola-Backed Decentralized Pictures Launches Web3 Film Funding Platform

articles.author: Ki Chong Tran
articles.description: As Ethereum's DeFi ecosystem grows, Bitcoin holders increasingly want to take part. Enter ERC-20 token Wrapped Bitcoin, a 1:1 representation of BTC.
articles.title: What is Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC)?

articles.author: MoreReese
articles.description: Loopring protocol provides developers the tools they need to build their own decentralized exchanges.
articles.title: What Is Loopring? An Ethereum Tool for Decentralized Exchanges and Payments

articles.author: Matt Hussey,Ki Chong Tran,Stephen Graves
articles.description: Every four years, the amount of Bitcoin awarded to miners is halved, an event known as the Bitcoin halving.
articles.title: What is the Bitcoin Halving? How Bitcoin's Supply is Limited

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Internet security company Cloudflare has announced it will run and fully stake several Ethereum validator nodes in the coming months.
articles.title: Cloudflare Expected to Run Ethereum Nodes as Merge Event Approaches

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: In a recent pilot, State Street executed a "T+0" trade with Credit Suisse using Paxos' permissioned blockchain service.
articles.title: Paxos, State Street, and Credit Suisse Trial Permissioned Blockchain for Same-Day Trade Settlement

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: South Korea’s financial authorities have reportedly embarked on an emergency assessment of domestic crypto exchanges.
articles.title: South Korea Launches 'Emergency' Inspections of Local Crypto Exchanges Amid Terra Collapse: Report

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Elon Musk said that his $44 billion acquisition "cannot move forward" until he has determined precisely how many users on Twitter are fake.
articles.title: Elon Musk: Twitter Deal 'Cannot Move Forward' Until CEO Shows Extent of Bot Activity

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Are they okay? Solana and Ethereum fans trade barbs after the surging Okay Bears gets a reverse-facing copycat.
articles.title: Solana NFTs Come 'Full Circle' as Okay Bears Knockoff Lands on Ethereum

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Metatheory’s "DuskBreakers" aims to be a wide-ranging sci-fi franchise spanning across NFTs, games, and comics.
articles.title: Twitch Co-Founder Raises $24M for Web3 Gaming Company Metatheory

articles.description: Avalanche is a platform for building powerful decentralized applications and custom blockchain implementations. Here's how it works.
articles.title: What Is Avalanche Network (AVAX)? The 'Flexible' Ethereum Competitor

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Terra's LUNA went to zero. Some Bitcoin traders also saw their accounts wiped out during last week’s market correction.
articles.title: $1.2 Billion in Bitcoin Was Liquidated During Last Week's Crypto Crash

articles.description: The Crypto Cannabis Club is the latest dispensary to open in the metaverse—and you can even order weed for real-world delivery.
articles.title: High Times in Web3? My Trip to An Ethereum Metaverse Dispensary

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The previous six-week record happened in 2014.
articles.title: Bitcoin's Seventh Straight Week in the Red Sets New Record

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: On Friday, the nation’s minister of finance announced that crypto soon will be subject to a 28% capital gains tax.
articles.title: Portugal’s Status as a Crypto Tax Haven Appears to Be Ending

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Under a plan proposed by Do Kwon, the current chain would be renamed Terra Classic. The new chain would ditch the UST stablecoin.
articles.title: Do Kwon Wants to Fork LUNA's Blockchain to Make 'Terra Classic'

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: It’s a signal that they saw the market turmoil “as a buying opportunity," according to Coinshares.
articles.title: Institutions Poured $300M Into Bitcoin Funds During Terra Meltdown: Report

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: Chainlink's hiring of a key AI executive could boost the reliability of its oracle, upon which much of the crypto world relies.
articles.title: Chainlink Hires Google Vet Who Developed TensorFlow AI System

articles.author: Matt Hussey,Tim Copeland,Daniel Phillips
articles.description: Lightning Network is a scaling solution that attempts to address Bitcoin's slow transaction speeds and high transaction costs.
articles.title: What is Lightning Network? Bitcoin's Scalability Solution

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: At its peak, Binance’s holdings were worth $1.6 billion. Today, that same investment is worth just $2,461 following Terra’s collapse.
articles.title: Binance CEO Says Exchange Never Sold Its 15.4M LUNA—Now Worth Just $2,461

articles.author: Daniel Phillips,Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Bitcoin doesn't need to be backed by anything tangible to be valuable; like fiat currencies, much of its value derives from consumer confidence.
articles.title: What Is Bitcoin Backed By?

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Yet another algorithmic stablecoin has lost its dollar peg as DEUS Finance's Terra-inspired DEI token plummets.
articles.title: Algorithmic Stablecoin From DEUS Finance Loses Dollar Peg, Plunging 30%

articles.description: Web3 is the next evolution of the Internet, built on blockchains. Blockchains are a new kind of database, making new types of peer-to-peer apps possible. This has profound implications for humanity.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What is Web3?

articles.description: In Episode 10 of the Navigating the Metaverse podcast, hosted by Cathy Hackl and Tommaso di Bartolo, Andrew Hayward of Decrypt and Josh Roth of Decrypt Studios discuss how companies are approaching the metaverse, where it could all go next, and what it was like to watch a movie in a Lamborghini on the moon.
articles.title: How Brands Are Creating Immersive Experiences in the Metaverse

articles.description: Crypto bloodbath! How low will the major coins go, and what about Terra and stablecoins? Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Jeff Benson, Stacy Elliott and Jason Nelson will discuss the news and parse through what’s happened and what might happen next.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto crash roundtable

articles.description: Infura co-founder and general manager E.G. Galano talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what Infura does, how the Bored Ape Yacht Club could have avoided the hiccups with its Otherdeed NFT mint, other hot NFT collections like Moonbirds, and Ethereum's gas fee issues.
articles.title: Infura Co-Founder E.G. Galano Talks Otherside NFT Mint, Ethereum Gas Fees

articles.description: The long-planned upgrade to Ethereum aims to improve the network’s scalability and security by switching to a proof of stake consensus mechanism.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is Ethereum 2.0? Ethereum's Consensus Layer and Merge Explained

articles.description: Kraken was one of the earliest Bitcoin exchanges, and also made waves for its strong-willed reactions to regulatory changes. CEO Jesse Powell joined the gm podcast to talk to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about Kraken's evolution, the killer use case for NFTs, and how San Francisco's tech scene has changed.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 9: Jesse Powell Releases the Kraken

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin interviews Kevin Seo, co-founder of Bored & Hungry, the BAYC-inspired burger joint in Los Angeles. Video shot and edited by Decrypt's Jason Nelson.
articles.title: Inside the Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Restaurant in L.A.

articles.description: Ava Labs president John Wu talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the meteoric rise of so-called "Ethereum killer" Avalanche (he hates that phrase), its utility and usability, AVAX token, tribalism in crypto, the SEC and regulation, and NFT backlash.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 8: All About Avalanche with John Wu

articles.description: Emily Yang, aka pplpleasr, the inspiration for the NFT collective PleasrDAO, talked DAOs and crypto interest groups on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says people shouldn't be joining DAOs with the aim of making money; she compares them to Subreddits or video game clans.
articles.title: NFT Artist pplpleasr: 'You Should Be Thinking of DAOs Like Subreddits'
